Auxiliary functions.

helpers.Rd

Auxiliary functions.

class_get_subclasses(x)

class_get_subclasses_vec(x)

pkg_get_all_methods(pkg)

Arguments

x

A class (length-one character vector).
pkg

Unquoted package name.

Details

class_get_subclasses will retur a two-column data.frame (columns "super" and "sub") with the relations between super- and subclasses.

class_get_subclasses_vec will return a character vector with all subclasses that inherit from x.

Examples

library(polmineR)
class_get_subclasses("count")
#>       super             sub
#> 1     count       partition
#> 2 partition  plpr_partition
#> 3 partition press_partition
#> 4     count          ngrams
class_get_subclasses_vec
#> function(x) unique(unlist(class_get_subclasses(x)))
#> <environment: namespace:ruml>
class_get_subclasses_vec("textstat")
#>  [1] "textstat"               "features"               "context"               
#>  [4] "cooccurrences"          "count"                  "partition"             
#>  [7] "cooccurrences_reshaped" "features_cooccurrences" "features_ngrams"       
#> [10] "Cooccurrences"          "plpr_partition"         "press_partition"       
#> [13] "ngrams"                 "hits"                  
pkg_get_all_methods(polmineR)
#>  [1] "!="                       "["                       
#>  [3] "[["                       "[[<-"                    
#>  [5] "%in%"                     "+"                       
#>  [7] "=="                       "$"                       
#>  [9] "$<-"                      "aggregate"

#> [13] "as.character"             "as.data.frame"
